webscript.description: OpenESDH Live Search Component Data Webscript. This webscript is now deprecated in favour of the annotated webscript that handles all contexts. See: openesdh-repo/src/main/java/dk/openesdh/repo/webscripts/search/LiveSearch.java or https://github.com/OpenESDH/openesdh-core/blob/develop/openesdh-repo/src/main/java/dk/openesdh/repo/webscripts/search/LiveSearch.java
